pages.title: Minedrake
pages.text: The Minedrake plant is the insane result of crossing a $(l:creatures/mandrake)Mandrake$(/l) with a $(item)Creeper$(). Arguably, it's one of the most dangerous of all the plant $(l:mutations/mindrake)mutations$(/l)!.$(p)Minedrakes will tend to awaken about 3 seconds after their seeds are left on the ground, and will target the player who tossed the seed, if any, or the closest player if otherwise.
